metadata.description: Curated quotes database for Onde books and social posts

quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quotes.quote: The art of happiness is also the art of suffering well. When we learn to acknowledge, embrace, and understand our suffering, we suffer much less.

quotes.author: James Hillman
quotes.quote: Real growth means descending into the abyss and darkness of life. Real growth is opening ourselves to uncertainty and vulnerability, becoming smaller, shrinking the illusions and pretensions.

quotes.author: Elio Vittorini
quotes.quote: Potremo mai avere una cultura che sappia proteggere l'uomo dalle sofferenze invece di limitarsi a consolarlo?

quotes.author: Rocco Scotellaro
quotes.quote: Io sono un filo d'erba, un filo d'erba che trema. E la mia Patria è dove l'erba trema. Un alito può trapiantare il mio seme lontano.

quotes.author: Franco Battiato
quotes.quote: Lascio agli eredi l'imparzialità, la volontà di crescere e capire, uno sguardo feroce e indulgente, per non offendere inutilmente.

quotes.author: Franco Battiato
quotes.quote: We never died, we were never born!

quotes.author: Michael A. Singer
quotes.quote: There is nothing more important to true growth than realizing that you are not the voice of the mind - you are the one who hears it.

quotes.author: Nisargadatta Maharaj
quotes.quote: Wisdom tells me I am nothing. Love tells me I am everything. Between the two my life flows.

quotes.author: Rick Rubin
quotes.quote: Living in tune with the seasons and other natural rhythms, observing the breath, moving your body, stilling the mind all access this expanded awareness and invite creative flow.

quotes.author: Emily Dickinson
quotes.quote: Sometimes with the Heart, Seldom with the Soul, Scarcer once with the Might, Few love at all.

quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quotes.quote: My formula for greatness in a human being is amor fati: that one wants nothing to be different, not forward, not backward, not in all eternity.
